item.title: Simplifying Corporate NPS with PensionBox
item.description: In FY25, around 72% of taxpayers chose the New Tax Regime. At Zerodha, that number was over 90%. This shift makes sense. The new tax regime trades deductions for simpler filing and lower tax rates. For many—especially younger salaried taxpayers, avoiding paperwork-heavy exemptions matters more than maximising deductions. With most deductions removed, salaried employees are left with the ₹75,000 standard deduction and one meaningful tax-saving option: the employer contribution to NPS, commonly called Corporate NPS.
